DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study : 1 . Tailor diabetes stress management intervention delivery community health worker ( CHWs ) serve urban Latino population . 2 . Investigate efficacy stress management intervention glycemic control . Secondary aim study : 3 . Investigate efficacy stress management intervention stress hormone , psychosocial functioning , stress-glucose reactivity . Study hypothesis : A CHW-led group-based diabetes education model enhance stress management education improve glycemic control CHW-led group-based diabetes education alone .
DOC.brief_title: Stress Management Among Latinos With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Latinos age 18 old ambulatory Spanish speaking Diagnosed type 2 diabetes least 1 year Hemoglobin A1c level great 7.0 Medical instability medical treatment require inpatient care Diagnoses bipolar disorder think disorder ( take medication prescribed either ) ; current substance abuse dependence disorder Current suicidality history suicide attempt History psychiatric hospitalization Taking antidepressant medication prescribe treatment depression accompany either ) change antidepressant regimen within previous 6 week , b ) anticipate change regimen period study . Such patient defer reevaluated eligibility 6 month
